s2.title: Unpacking the files
s2.p: &javaparsername; is packaged as a JAR file for all platforms and operating systems. You need to run the Java jar command to unpack the distribution.

ul.li: This command creates a "&javaparserdirectory;" sub-directory in the current directory containing all the files.

s2.title: Files in this release

tr.td: Jar file containing all the parser class files
Jar file containing all sample class files
Directory containing Javadoc API for parser framework
Directory containing sample XML data files

s2.note: To use &javaparsername; you do not need the source files.
